alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 10:19PM EDT until March 16 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina... Central Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1018 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Elloree, or 8 miles east of Brookdale, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Brookdale, Summerton, Elloree, Santee State Park, Santee, Pinewood, Cameron, Poplar Creek Landing, Rimini, St. Paul, Stumphole Landing, Yonder Field, Wilkinson Heights, Creston, Lone Star and Low Falls Landing. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 148 and 160. Interstate 95 between mile markers 99 and 110. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
